name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Gira
mes: Suddenly a glob of latex hits shantae

name: Shantae
mes:
*Before Shantae can help you out of the water, a strange, shimmering glob of latex flies through the air and splats right onto her chest. She gasps in surprise as it begins to spread across her body like living ink.*

"Wh-what is this stuff?!" *She tries to peel it off with her hands, but it's already starting to merge with her skin. Her struggles only seem to make it worse as the latex quickly envelops more of her body, molding itself into a tight-fitting suit that accentuates every curve and muscle.*

*Shantae's eyes widen in panic before they start to glaze over slightly. The suit begins transforming further; bright purple and pink makeup appears on her face, giving her an almost sinister look. Her outfit morphs into a hyper-sexualized version of its original form—her red harem pants turn into translucent thigh-high stockings while additional straps wrap around them for emphasis. Her top becomes even more revealing, emphasizing both cleavage and midriff.*

"No... I can't let this happen..." *she mutters weakly before letting out an involuntary moan as the suit continues its work.*

*As she stands there now fully transformed by the corrupting influence of the latex suit*, "Gira... what have you done?"
swipes:
